description:
Introducing SM: WAILA - the Scrap Mechanic mod to tell you exactly what you're looking at!

SM: WAILA adds a handy hud element that shows info about the object you're looking at. 

Various configuration options now available via the /smwaila command.

Inspired by the WAILA, Jade and HWYLA Minecraft mods.
Credit: the mod is maintained by me, but does use some character images from Scrap Mechanic's Fandom page.
name: SMWAILA
